channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Australia deal alert: Fly to Sydney from Atlanta, Dallas and other US cities from $833 round-trip
item.description: Airfare deals to Australia don’t pop up very often, so when we see one that’s worth jumping on, we want you to know about it as soon as possible — you...

item.title: New first class, business class and the rest: Flying the Japan Airlines A350-1000 in all 4 cabins
item.description: We boarded the rather new and rather lovely Japan Airlines A350-1000, which has all-new products in every cabin. In particular, the first- and busines...

item.title: Prime beach access and delicious food: My stay at the iconic W Barcelona
item.description: [circuit type=review circuit_id=”20420181026″] It’s been 10 years since TPG last reviewed the W Barcelona, so on a recent football-focused trip to the...

item.title: Choice Privileges award nights no longer top out at 35,000 points per night
item.description: Earlier this month, Choice Privileges hiked the award cost of Preferred Hotels & Resorts stays to up to 87,000 points per night. At the time, I celebr...

item.title: Fifth-freedom routes: Flying top international airlines without setting foot in their home countries
item.description: Fifth-freedom routes are a unique quirk of aviation that gives North American travelers a chance to experience superior planes and service, often at a...
